cyclone.name: CINDY
cyclone.current_location: about 280 miles south of Morgan City, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to move northwest toward the TX-LA border late Wednesday, then turn north and weaken while moving through the lower Mississippi Valley toward the Ohio Valley by the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: south-central/southwest Louisiana or upper Texas coast (near TX-LA border)

weather_observation.watch_coast: San Luis Pass, TX eastward to the Mouth of the Pearl River, LA
weather_observation.warning_coast: San Luis Pass, TX to the Mouth of the Pearl River, LA (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from central Texas eastward to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.rainfall: Remnant moisture may bring occasional showers to the Great Lakes late Saturdayâ€“Sunday, but widespread heavy rain is not expected at Detroit.
